name: Hydrapple ex
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Ripening Charge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic {G} Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, heal 30 damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Syrup Storm
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each {G} Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
